find_ice_path_v1.description: Calculates a path through ice sliding tiles using the global map_xml_string. Returns a JSON array of button presses.

history.commit_message: Updating ice pathfinding tool to correctly handle obstacles and sliding mechanics.

find_path_v11.description: Advanced pathfinding tool that handles land-water transitions and avoids obstacles. Uses global map_xml_string.

history.commit_message: Initial version of refined pathfinding tool for land/water transitions.
Fixing pathfinding tool by allowing movement into PITS if they are the target.
Updating pathfinding tool to handle land-water transitions and avoid obstacles.
Refining pathfinding tool to handle land-water transitions, avoid obstacles, and correctly identify the player position from map XML.

get_reachable_unseen_tiles.description: Finds all unseen tiles that are directly adjacent to reachable, passable tiles on the current map. Returns a JSON array of coordinates.

history.commit_message: Fixed the tool to execute the logic and print the result properly. Removed function wrapping to ensure execution in the harness environment.
Added 'ICE' and 'WARP_CARPET_DOWN' to passable types for better exploration.
Updating exploration tool to find reachable unseen tiles.
Refining exploration tool to accurately identify reachable unseen tiles from the current player position.

plan_boulder_push.description: Calculates a sequence of pushes to move a boulder to a target tile.

history.commit_message: Fixing boulder push tool by ensuring player can stand on the push tile and allowing PIT as the target destination.
